localize.text: In our world, the mind is nothing anymore.
Everything is advancing, but the human mind is too slow to catch up.
All that remains are the 26 Singularities and those who are tied to them.
Humankind has deserted their former beliefs. They now do not respect the various things which were supporting us.
Now, no one ever dreams...
Nobody ever believes in anything or desires anything.
The belief once strong within somebody is now obsolete and worthless.
Everything has gone quiet as if nothing happened in the first place.
But, A couldn’t stand the silence.
So what do you think happened to A?
On a bright sunny day, he died.
I was both the first witness of his death and one of the culprits of his murder.
However, A has been existing here, watching you ever since you stepped inside.
Sometimes, the Sephirahs would ask me this:
Why do we have to bear this pain?
Machines should exist only as a tool for a specified work.
Why do we have to know the agony of loss, obsessions, hope, and despair?
I thought I could answer anything.
But not even I could answer that.
“A machine must behave like a machine.”
That was something A told me often.
Perhaps A, the one who would know better than anyone, made us like this because it’s all a puppet show for him.
You seem to have no idea.
Well, of course, there’s no way for you to know.
But now it’s time for you to know the answer.
It’s something I’ve always done.
First as a hope, second as agony, third as a pain, fourth as anxiety, fifth as distrust...
Now nothing remains.
Commencing memory synchronization...
